sub_title: Co- Owner/Managing Director IMCC at IMCC BVBA
summary:
Multi-lingual international healthcare professional: ENGLISH-DUTCH-FRENCH-GERMAN
Medical devices and pharmaceutical
With extensive experience in clinical trials, management, sales/marketing
 A profound clinical background in cardiovascular diseases, oncology and central nerve system. 
A deep understanding of diagnostic imaging technologies and general healthcare related issues on a European level and strong customer focus. 

Theurapeutic areas: ONCOLGY - CARDIOLOGY - CNS
Phase I, II, III and IV

excellent leadership, rigorous, accurate and solution oriented
People minded team player
Passionate healthcare professional
